description: Retrieves the details of a vpn site link connection.

properties.description: Properties of the VPN site link connection.

subscription_id.description: The subscription credentials which uniquely identify the Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

resource_group_name.description: The resource group name of the VpnGateway.

connection_name.description: The name of the vpn connection.

link_connection_name.description: The name of the vpn connection.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a resource group. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: Gets a unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.
